title: [RESOLVED] 11/21 Patching Issues
body:
> Update: 12:47 PM PST
>
> Some players may be able to patch now, but the fix is still propagating to all endpoints. Please give it some time, but the fix should be working shortly for everyone.


> Update: 12:03 PM PST
>
> We discovered there were some missing file(s) from the patching line. We're in the process of re-syncing them to ensure they're available, but we have to be careful with the process. I'll update here again once we're able to restore them.

Hi Everyone -

At ~10:30 AM PST, we see that players are having issues patching. We're working on the fix and will provide updates here.

replies.body: {{sticker:sg-lulu}} zoe is so annoying she broke the client
Palpatine's Voice "Execute order 003."
Hurrry DUDE :D btw MAKE BLUE ESSANCE EASIER TO GET
you now get 50 with your first win bonus

Oh boy; so after 156 First Wins, I can finally get the newest champion! :D
NICE!
That's 156 days which is approximately 5 months~
you get less in comparison. I preferred 575 exp :\
50 blue essence every day isn't a great way to do it
Why i don't get...:/
MAKE BLUE ESSENCE EASIEST TO GET 50 PER DAY ISN'T ENOUGHT
oh wow 50 be, that's so awesome T_T

There is a Live Incident Breakdown Board?
Well, that... says a lot.

Glad to see you're keeping peeps informed though on the issue; that's pretty dope.

> [{quoted}](name=Vhan8765,realm=NA,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=HLBQzvEa,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-11-21T19:49:51.608+0000)
>
> There is a Live Incident Breakdown Board?
> Well, that... says a lot.

It's like that like from Broken Arrow : "I don't know what's scarier, that we lost a nuclear warhead or that it happens often enough that there's a name for it."

Me reading the comments 
https://giphy.com/gifs/ted-trump-cruz-12aW6JtfvUdcdO
Have they tried turning it off and turning it back on?
Hahahahaha that's the  IT technician method
give us blue essence for our troubles{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

> [{quoted}](name=Little Ms Maggie,realm=NA,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=HLBQzvEa,comment-id=0144,timestamp=2017-11-21T20:00:31.884+0000)

yahhhs
I just wanted to play before work lol :(
Fix: skip work and play before tomorrow, you will still play before work.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Zoe broke the Game XD 
I just wanna play with my little troublemaker
That sounds so wrong...

Billion dollar company, has a PBE to test stuff.

Everything still breaks on patch day.

This may just be me, but I can't remember the last time something like this happened. I understand that you can't please everyone, but I feel that Riot has earned our leniency through past reliability.
Is the 11/21 an information about how much they already fixed?
Thats todays date bro
awe, i was in the middle of a match as Shen adc :/
So it was a blessing for you then
But Rito I already patched and played a flex and a custom :( Why do i need to patchhhhhhhh{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Top 10 Anime Betrayals.{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

listen here buddy

i just came home from a brutal day of working in an office cubicle, mind-numbingly typing away at some meaningless paper. Guess what was on my mind that whole day. I'm gonna go home and play some league of legends. And now you ruined it. So get your ass to the grindstone and fucking fix this game thanks have a good day.

listen here buddy

dont be so entitled, do something else,read a book, play a different game. Problems come up all the time, considering how big their game is ofcourse they're working the best they can. League isnt all you have buddy
im back after 1 year of league break ... look like rito is telling me to extend this break {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I blame Zoe for this :T
Someone hold me{{sticker:sg-janna}}
Patched far enough to buy Zoe.... dannnng you code 003!!!!!!

"Servers will be down for about an hour!" 
Sweet I can go out for lunch and come back to play Zoe.
2 hours later and everything is broken.

WHAT DID YOU DO.
ok it kicked me out of mid game... will i have a stupid leave buster?
At ~10:30 AM PST, we see that players are having issues patching. We're working on the fix and will provide updates here... but we took an arrow in the knee.
Hi Riot! how long its will take ?
and agian {{champion:142}}  broke the client happend on the pbe aswell

usually 4-5 hours, or more, when they open a topic about it...

"Live incident breakdown board."
...
So where's the updates?
Or Is it just "Hey, something broke again lol" forum post?{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
